description: white plate with wide rim; blue glaze decoration of man and woman walking at center, man holds object in PL hand, woman points to PR; two tall trees frame figures; building at L in background with foliage, trees and fence; three birds in clouds at top
markings: on back, on label: [57D]; on back, on label: [Fine Bristol delft european/ c. 1755 (see Reg. fig. 72 (crossed out) 13A(?)]; on back, collector\'s label
title: Plate
